avatarSizeAndFormat: Max size: 2MB. PNG or JPG only.
changeRoleDescription: Set whether the user is an administrator, moderator, or regular user.
changeUsernameDescription: If the field is left empty, the record will be saved with a random username.
clickToSendVerificationEmail: Click here to resend the verification email.
confirmActionDescription: To continue, enter your administrator password.
confirmYourPasswordDescription: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
deactivateAccountDescription: Disables login and deletes all existing sessions for the user account.
deleteAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccountConfirmationDescription: Once your account is deleted, all its resources and data will be permanently removed. Enter your password to confirm permanent deletion.
deleteAccountDescription: Delete your account and all its resources
deleteCommentConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this comment? This action cannot be undone.
deletePostConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this post? This action cannot be undone.
deleteUserAccountDescription: Deletes the user account and all associated data.
editCommentDescription: Edit the content of your comment.
editPostDescription: Edit the content of your post.
emailNoVerified: Your email address is not verified.
forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
loginDescription: Enter your email and password to log in.
managementDescription: Manage users registered on the social network.
noFollowers: This user has no followers yet.
noFollowing: This user isn’t following anyone yet.
profileInfoDescription: Update your username and email address.
registerDescription: Enter your details below to create your account.
resetInfoDescription: Remove the current avatar and replace the username with a random one.
resetUserPasswordDescription: Send the user a password reset email.
searchUserPlaceholder: Search by name or user ID...
settingsDescription: Manage your profile and account settings.
updatePasswordDescription: Make sure your account uses a long, random password to stay secure.
verificationEmailSent: A new verification link has been sent to the email you provided during registration.
verificationLinkSent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
verifyEmailMessage: Please verify your email address by clicking the link we just sent you.
warningDescription: Proceed with caution, this action cannot be undone.
welcomeMessage: Connect, share, and discover what others are thinking.
